actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the bear can’t use its claws on another target.

special_abilities.name: Grappler
special_abilities.desc: The bear has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
